root.heading: Teeth Whitening
root.text:
Is there an upcoming event in your life that requires you to look your very best? We can help you take great pride in your appearance - so you can love displaying your white, glossy celebrity-quality smile.

To help you reach and maintain the shade that best fits your lifestyle, we offer three teeth whitening options — each more effective than its predecessor:

  • Our home-bleaching system — a custom set of bleaching trays made via impressions and modified to brighten the toughest cracks and crevices in your mouth
  • ZOOM® Advanced Power in-office treatment — a same-day treatment option that brightens your teeth anywhere from 5-8 shades in under an hour (includes custom touch-up trays)

If you have sensitive teeth, we offer various concentrations and a desensitizing fluoride regiment to prevent any discomfort, while you still thrive from our uplifting dental work. What do you have to lose? A brilliantly white smile awaits you. Call Dr. Richard Dervin to learn more.
